attributes.background: We oppose the proposal that HMRC (as part of its job cuts programme) removes work from our local offices in Bolton,Rochdale and Bury and centralize it in Manchester. This will result in increased hardship for our staff members, loss of income to the local economy in these towns and will increase congestion in Manchester and add pressure on public transport. There will also be less quality service to our customers and more inconvenience for them.

government_responses.details:
